Title: Auto transitions
Description: Simple scheme with three elements connected by auto transitions.

Title: Direct transitions with approval
Description: Simple scheme with three elements (incl. approval command) connected by direct transitions.

Title: Direct and reverse transitions with approval and deny
Description: Simple scheme with three elements(incl. approval and deny commands) connected by direct and reverse transitions.

Title: Timer
Description: Simple scheme with two elements connected by transitions with timers.

Title: Expression otherwise
Description: Simple scheme with three elements connected by transitions with expressions and otherwise conditions.

Title: Expression condition otherwise
Description: Simple scheme with four elements connected by transitions with expressions, action and otherwise condisions.

Title: Parallel processes without waiting
Description: Simple scheme with parallel processes without waiting all branches.

Title: Parallel processes with waiting
Description: Simple scheme with parallel processes that waiting all branches.

Title: Parallel approval without branches
Description: Simple scheme with three elements for demonstration approval with 2 stages.

Title: Parameters and expressions
Description: A simple scheme for demonstration work with parameters and expressions. In Parameter written number 5, if the parameter value is less than 10 the parameter is incremented. When the parameter is equal 10 the work ends.

Title: HTTP request
Description: Simple scheme for demonstration work with http requset. Scheme contains action for send http requst and conditon for check http requst.

Title: Parameter expression otherwise
Description: Simple scheme for with three elements (incl. action for work with parameters) connected by transitions with expressions and otherwise conditions.

Title: Parameter expression condition otherwise
Description: Simple scheme for with three elements (incl. action for work with parameters) connected by transitions with expressions, action and otherwise conditions.

Title: File write read
Description: A simple scheme to demonstrate create, read, and write operations with files.

Title: Directory compress
Description: A simple scheme to demonstrate work with directory and compress, uncompress operations with the archive.

Title: Loop for int
Description: Simple scheme for demonstration loop for numbers 1-10.

Title: Loop for date time
Description: Simple scheme for demonstration loop for one month.

Title: Loop foreach
Description: Simple scheme for demonstration loop foreach for collection  "one, two, three, four, five ".

Title: Loop foreach from parameter
Description: Simple scheme for demonstration loop foreach for values from parameter.
